```{r}
library(tidyverse)
setwd('~/Desktop/p19')

p19t14 <- read_csv("p19t14.csv")
p19t14 <- p19t14%>%
  select(-'Bureau of Justice Statistics')

p19t14_flip <- as.data.frame(t(p19t14))

```
